snippet: Chandler Parsons scored 29 points, and hit a key 3-pointer, to lift Dallas, which led by 30 points before halftime for the second time in two home games....

headline.print_headline: Parsons, Mavs Hold On to Beat Celtics 118-113
headline.main: Parsons Helps Mavericks Hold On Against Celtics

lead_paragraph: Chandler Parsons scored 29 points, and hit a key 3-pointer, to lift Dallas, which led by 30 points before halftime for the second time in two home games.
